page.title: 19GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: Most boys play football in the school playground,whilst the girls play netball,hopscotch and catch.Some girls and boys play singing games like Brown Girl in the Ring or, In and out the Dusty Bluebells. A popular game with a small ball is sevenses. At home a variety of board games are played like Monopoly or Cluedo. A large number of children have computer games or a computer itself,on these, games like Pacman or a Space game are popular. Also popular amongst young children are games involving their imagination for example;Mummies and Daddies,school or a variety of imaginative games involving Goodies and Baddies. A lot of children enjoy riding a bicycle and a few enjoy horse riding. Many children enjoy sport activities and belong to Scouts, Guides or Clubs.
